snippet: A report indicated that the bombs have been documented in armed conflicts in Libya, Sudan, Syria, Ukraine and Yemen.
abstract: Cluster Munition Coalition issues annual report which documents use of cluster bombs in Libya, Sudan, Syria, Ukraine and Yemen in 2015; none of five countries have signed treaty banning cluster munitions.
lead_paragraph: A report indicated that the bombs have been documented in armed conflicts in Libya, Sudan, Syria, Ukraine and Yemen.

headline.main: Banned Cluster Bombs Were Used in Five Countries, Report Says
headline.print_headline: Report Notes Use of Cluster Bombs

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Arms Control and Limitation and Disarmament
